m_szDocTitle: Volvo S60 T6 PHEV To Be Unveiled At Shanghai International Auto Show
m_szDocSumamry: Volvo S60 T6 PHEV To Be Unveiled At Shanghai International Auto Show April 22nd, 2015 by Christopher DeMorro   Originally published on Gas2 . The Volvo S60 T6 PHEV will be unveiled this week at the Shanghai International Auto Show. It is built on the long wheelbase S60 chassis the company already makes for the Chinese market. Volvo already offers its XC90 T8 PHEV in markets around the world (it’s coming to the US this summer). It also sells the V60, the wagon version of the S60, in a plug in hybrid version featuring a diesel engine in Europe. As shown in China, the S60 T6 PHEV has a 2.0-liter
